snippet.title: Lunch Break - FREE Android game!
snippet.description:
Rated 9/10 at indiegamecritic.com

My third independent Android game, Lunch Break, is now available to download for free from here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ashumbesher.lunchbreak

The object of the game is to make sure Chris enjoys eating his lunch in peace for as long as possible. Chris's enjoyment drops when his lunch is disturbed, so he must Duck under and dodge hazards while swatting and kicking pests to avoid having his picnic ruined. When his enjoyment reaches zero, it's game over. Every fourth round is a bonus level; shove as many snacks into Chris's mouth as you can but be careful of the pigeon...
